title: Impact of Canadian purchases of Mexican fin assets

content.question: Assume that Canadian consumers increase their demand for Mexican financial assets How would the international supply of Canadian dollars, the value of the Mexican peso relative to the Canadian dollar, and Canadian net exports to Mexico change?

choices.label: Supply of Canadian Dollars Value of the Peso Canadian Net Exports Increase Increase Increase
Supply of Canadian Dollars Value of the Peso Canadian Net Exports Increase Increase Decrease
Supply of Canadian Dollars Value of the Peso Canadian Net Exports Decrease Increase Decrease
Supply of Canadian Dollars Value of the Peso Canadian Net Exports Decrease Decrease Increase
Supply of Canadian Dollars Value of the Peso Canadian Net Exports No change Increase Decrease

content.answer: Supply of Canadian Dollars Value of the Peso Canadian Net Exports Increase Increase Increase

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
